about_the_game:
A challenging puzzle game about an Artificial Intelligence on its own... With you.
Master the game's unique 'tile-hopping' movement system and new mechanics and enemies in every world to solve more than 100 carefully crafted puzzles.

In this demo, experience the first two worlds of Limiter!, and get a taste for what the full game has to offer.

Your progress will be stored and you'll be able to continue playing where the demo leaves off when you purchase the full title.


Play as a mysterious artificial intelligence named Limiter!.exe and explore a long forgotten computer network called ARCANE.
Use the game's unique 'tile-hopping' movement system to switch the lights back on, explore the world map, and bring ARCANE back online.

Restore power to the system.
Find harder puzzles.
Feel better.


Features an incredible original soundtrack by the talented Lukepi. Plug in some headphones and watch the trailer for a preview!


[NOT AVAILABLE IN THE DEMO VERSION]
Create your own levels! Every world you complete in the story unlocks more level parts to be used until the only limit is your own imagination!
Easily create, test and share as many levels as you can think of using the same tools as the developer!

name: Limiter! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 132 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 500
  • Storage: 89 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Limiter!.exe is an Artificial Intelligence who only speaks in puzzles. Hop your way through 100+ levels in 7 chapters of a story about one intelligence doing its best to reach another in this brain-busting puzzle game!
